title: Нове життя Василини Павлівни
overview: Osynivka. A place that God is about to forget. Village teacher Vasylyna Pavlivna is already desperate to change her life – she lives with two children and a man, with whom she is officially divorced. But one day, a woman witnesses a conflict in which criminals kill one another.Vasylyna Pavlivna wants to call the police, but notices a silver briefcase stuffed with new bills on the passenger seat. At the age of 35, she makes the first rash act - she takes the case with the money. However, this series is not about money, but about how we underestimate ourselves and refuse to take risks.
